definition: dagger-axe/abbr. for 戈瑞[ge1 rui4]/(Tw) abbr. for 戈雷[ge1 lei2]
more than ten/a dozen or more
to go through numerous (setbacks, revisions etc)
to be on the brink of/to be on the verge of
just a very few (idiom); tiny number/not many at all/You count them on your fingers.

sentences.english: The current through the resistor is several thousandths of an ampere.
sentences.chinese: 該電阻上的電流爲零點零零幾安培。

sentences.english: Right now, Hockaday's prototypes put out only a few milli- watts of power.
sentences.chinese: 現在，霍克蒂的燃料電池原型只能輸出幾毫瓦的電力。

sentences.english: They're cheap, a few bucks at the most.
sentences.chinese: 蒸籠很便宜，最多幾美元。

sentences.english: The following sub-sections will address the final three of the above steps.
sentences.chinese: 以下幾小節內容將介紹上述後三個步驟。

sentences.english: The Conductor's analytical mind helps her to ensure that no detail goes unconsidered.
sentences.chinese: 售票員的分析的頭腦幫助她，以確保所有細節都幾。

sentences.english: Some cases of explainations of medical classics by professor Xu Ping are presented.
sentences.chinese: 文中列舉了幾則徐平教授解析“醫經”的案例。

sentences.english: A North Korean soldier stared at them from just a few centimeters away, through a window.
sentences.chinese: 一名北韓軍人在幾公分外的窗口另一側注視着他們。

sentences.english: The downside is that you’ll lose at least a few additional inches of ceiling height.
sentences.chinese: 缺點是你可能會額外的失去幾英寸的頭頂空間淨高。

sentences.english: Several factors lead to this downward spiral of the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 幾大因素使得失業狀況呈現螺旋形惡化。

sentences.english: The Congo people decorate their pipes with figural and geometric patterns.
sentences.chinese: 剛果人民用幾和形狀的樣式裝飾他們的菸斗。

sentences.english: Ben turned his head to look behind him. The skeleton was only a few feet away.
sentences.chinese: 本轉過頭朝身後看了看，那骷髏離自己只有幾英尺了。

sentences.english: What is the percentage of scouts to the total members of the four uniform teams?
sentences.chinese: 童軍的人數佔這四個制服團體總人數的幾分之幾？

sentences.english: These refer to the last days when the kingdom of God will be set up on earth.
sentences.chinese: 這些提及的最後幾天時，上帝的王國將成立地球上。

sentences.english: A Hawaiian green sea turtle swims in just a few feet of water.
sentences.chinese: 一隻夏威夷綠海龜在幾英尺水下游泳。

sentences.english: In the next installment(s) I'll talk about the packer application itself.
sentences.chinese: 在下面幾部分裏面我會討論加殼程序主體的製作。

sentences.english: The Guinean government and people thank for China's years of disinterested and generous assistance.
sentences.chinese: 幾政府和人民感謝中方多年來給予幾的無私慷慨幫助。

definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
